articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Football Match between Kalmaegi and Jebi Teams
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Football Match between Kalmaegi and Jebi Teams
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched a men's football match between the Kalmagi team and the Jebi team together with service personnel of the KPA.
					 When he appeared in the auditorium, the players and audience enthusiastically welcomed him, shouting stormy "hurrah!"
					
					 The Jebi team beat the Kalmagi team 4:2.
					
					 The audience applauded the players who fully displayed their high football techniques, strong mental power and stubborn spirit.
					
					 When the match was over, Kim Jong Un congratulated the players on their successful match, warmly acknowledging the players and audience.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be served as guidelines in remarkably developing sports of the country, saying that in order to develop sports it is important to make the public pay strong attention to sports by frequently organizing football and other sports matches.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, Kim Su Gil, O Kum Chol, No Kwang Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Jang Tong Un, Yun Jong Rin, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song and Kim Sung Yon.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulations to President of Malta
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulations to President of Malta
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Marie Louise Coleiro Preca, upon her election as president of Malta.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the relations between the DPRK and Malta would grow stronger in line with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries and wished the president of Malta success in her work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: 29th National Festival of Science, Technology to Be Held
articles.content:
29th National Festival of Science, Technology to Be Held
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The 29th National Festival of Science and Technology will take place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House from April 23 to May 2 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 The theme of the festival is the development of the ultra-modern technology and close combination of science and technology with production.
					
					 The festival will be attended by units including scientific research institutes and educational organs, industrial establishments and cooperative farms as well as scientists, technicians, teachers, workers, farmers, Three Revolution Team members and officials. Presented to the festival will be the scientific and technological achievements and experiences which were highly appreciated at the festivals of science and technology held by ministries and national institutions, universities, Pyongyang City and provinces (municipality) in February and March.
					
					 Scientific and technological achievements presentation will be held among organizations and individuals and there will also be lectures on ultra-modern science and technology, exchange of new technologies, exhibition contest, etc.

articles.title: Moranbong Band Gives Performance in Taehongdan County
articles.content:
Moranbong Band Gives Performance in Taehongdan County
 Taehongdan, April 6 (KCNA) -- The artistes of the Moranbong Band gave a performance in Taehongdan County. They already shook Samjiyon, another county at the foot of Mt. Paektu, with their spectacular performance.
					 Their performance was given at the hall of culture in Taehongdan County on Sunday.
					
					 Put on the stage were female solo "O My Motherland Full of Hope", violin solo and light music "Attraction and Reverence", light music "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu", female duo and pangchang "Shine, Jong Il Peak" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of the brilliant Songun Commander Kim Jong Il who demonstrated before the world the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation, the sun's Korea, with his outstanding ideology, matchless leadership ability and noble virtue.
					
					 The audience broke into arousing applauses as the kind-hearted images of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were displayed in the background of the stage amid the song "Taehongdan Is Place Good to Live in" by a female soloist.
					
					Also touching the heartstrings of the audience was female trio "Taehongdan of 3 000-ri", a song that conveys the great loving care shown by Kim Jong Il who visited the county again and again on his way of providing the Songun revolutionary leadership and turned it into a model county in potato production and a socialist land of bliss.
					
					Female solo and pangchang "Warm Feelings" and "We Think of the Marshal Day and Night", female duo and pangchang "Our Marshal" and female quartet "We Cannot Live without You" heightened the atmosphere of the performance as they reflected the loyalty of the people in the area of Mt. Paektu to Marshal Kim Jong Un, who devotes himself to translating into reality the desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on this land.
					
					Listening to the finale "We Know Nobody but You" and "People Are United in Single Mind" the audience hardened their pledge to unite in single mind around the Marshal and reap a rich harvest on the Paektusamcholli Plain in the spirit of Taehongdan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Greatness of Kim Jong Un's Leadership
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Greatness of Kim Jong Un's Leadership
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday carries an article to mark the 2nd anniversary of the publication of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party".
					 The work, issued on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), comprehensively deals with the idea and theories that serve as guidelines in victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche including the idea of holding fast to Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal guiding idea, accelerating the struggle for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and further establishing the Party's monolithic leadership system, the idea of strengthening the single-minded unity of the Party and revolutionary ranks in every way and thoroughly embodying our Party's Songun-based revolutionary line as well as the idea of bringing about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living and building an economic power.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and proclaimed the modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of our Party. This is an exploit to be specially recorded in the work for glorifying their ideas and exploits for all ages.
					
					 Kim Jong Un led all the Party organizations and officials to respect the people, put the interests and conveniences of the people above all and bring about a fresh turn in the work with the masses by moving their minds. His leadership serves as a fundamental source of further consolidating the single-minded unity of our revolutionary ranks.
					
					 He successfully carried forward the Songun revolutionary idea and leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, thereby leading the acute confrontation with the U.S. to victory with the might of Songun, and ranked the DPRK among those countries manufacturing and launching satellites and producing nuclear weapons. This provided a sure guarantee for dynamically pushing forward the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 As the DPRK holds Kim Jong Un in high esteem at the highest post of the revolution and there is the wise and seasoned leadership of the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea shining with the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the victory of the Juche cause of the building of a thriving socialist nation is sure to be accomplished, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Aim in Setting up MD
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Aim in Setting up MD 
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- U.S. Congress is discussing a plan to spend a total of 37 billion U.S. dollars for the establishment of a missile defense system by 2019. It is said that the U.S. needs such a huge fund for the protection of the U.S. mainland, its forces abroad and allies.
					 What matters is its excuse that the MD system is to cope with the "missile threats" from the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary that the U.S. despicable talk about "threat" from the DPRK is aimed to justify its arms buildup pursuant to its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 The U.S. new domination strategy is designed to contain big powers and hold a military hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. regards MD as an important leverage for world domination.
					
					 Last year it decided to additionally deploy interceptor missiles to cope with the "threat" of inter-continental ballistic missiles of the DPRK and called for completing it by 2017. It is now busy, deploying in Japan near the Korean peninsula a new high-performance radar for tracking ballistic missiles, additionally deploying interceptor missiles in the western region of the U.S. which already houses lots of interceptor missiles and reinforcing MD system on Guam. All this is prompted by its sinister intention to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and contain potential rivals in the region.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly worried about the missiles of the DPRK, it had better roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop the nuclear war moves.

articles.title: Japan Denounced for Lifting Ban on Weapons Export
articles.content:
Japan Denounced for Lifting Ban on Weapons Export
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on April 2 to denounce Japan for lifting its ban on the weapons export.
					 The speakers at the conference said the Japanese government adopted the "three principles on the transfer of hardware for defence" on April 1 meant to totally lift the ban on the export of weapons.
					
					 They said the policy is also targeted against the Korean peninsula just like the exercise of the "right to collective self-defence", adding this will make it possible to offer south Korea offensive weapons jointly produced by the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 They warned that they would never remain an on-looker to the Japanese authorities' act of sparking off an arms race and fanning up confrontation in Northeast Asia.
					
					 They demanded the south Korean authorities force Japan to withdraw the new principles, not conniving at it.

articles.title: Japan's Crackdown upon Chongryon Denounced
articles.content:
Japan's Crackdown upon Chongryon Denounced
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on April 2 bitterly denouncing the Japanese authorities for their brigandish moves to seize the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said Japan can never be pardoned as it has cracked down Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and attempted to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon, far from making an apology and reparation for its wrongdoings to the Korean people.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Chongryon is a dignified overseas Koreans organization of the DPRK for defending the legitimate rights of the Koreans in Japan, and the Korean Hall of Chongryon has played the role of the diplomatic mission of the DPRK for the DPRK-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia under the condition that there are no diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 When looking back on history, the Japanese authorities adopted a hostile policy toward the DPRK as its state policy and have made desperate efforts to inflict sanctions on the DPRK and stifle it and resorted to ceaseless political suppression and national persecution of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 To protect the rights and properties of the Koreans in Japan, who are direct victims of the forcible drafting of Koreans committed by Japanese imperialists in the past and their descendants, is the state obligation of the Japanese authorities and unavoidable legal and moral responsibilities.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once the illegal decision of allowing the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon and persecution and crackdown upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan issued a statement on April 2 denouncing the Japanese authorities for their moves to seize the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities have persistently committed the politically-motivated suppression and persecution of Chongryon, a dignified overseas Koreans organization of the DPRK, and finally kicked off the fascist action of deciding to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 The decision touched off the surging indignation of the Korean nation as it is a typical example of the persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the Japanese authorities.
					
					 To ensure the national right of Koreans in Japan, who are direct victims of the forcible drafting of Koreans committed by Japan in the past and their descendants, is the state obligation of the Japanese authorities and unavoidable legal and moral responsibilities.
					
					 The illegal decision of allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon is a wanton violation of the dignity and the right to existence of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, and an infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement bitterly denounced the Japanese authorities for their brigandish moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon and strongly urged Japan to lift at once the illegal decision.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The full text of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was posted on the Internet homepage by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Mar. 28.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), clarifies the immortal historic feats President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea and its significance. It also deals with the founding of the Juche idea, its philosophical principles, socio-historical principles, guiding principles and historical significance.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Highly Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Highly Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan and Italy from Mar. 21 to 31 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					Displayed at the venues of the seminars were works of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books and photos showing the Korean people's achievements in building a thriving country.
					
					Sh. Shabdolov, chairperson of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, made a speech: 
					
					Kim Il Sung was a great leader always alive in the hearts of humankind for his great accomplishments for the Korean revolution and world revolution.
					
					He fathered the immortal Juche idea and turned the DPRK into a socialist fortress by leading the revolution and construction as required by the Juche idea.
					
					He was a genuine internationalist revolutionary who made great contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity "Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised the President as a genuine leader of people who dedicated all his life to them.
					
					Kim Jong Un is turning the DPRK into the people's country good to live in by carrying forward Kim Il Sung's politics of love for the people, he noted.
					
					Alessandro Mustillo, national coordinator of the Communist Youth Front of Italy, said the Korean people could defend the nation's sovereignty despite the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK as they increased their military capabilities under the banner of Songun.
					
					He voiced his will to conduct more brisk solidarity activities in support of the Koreans advancing under the banner of socialism.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Acts against DPRK Are Not Beneficial: DR Congolese Organizations
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Acts against DPRK Are Not Beneficial: DR Congolese Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association made public a joint statement on Mar. 19 in support of the statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC).
					 In recent days the U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK have gone beyond a tolerance limit, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has strained the situation on the Korean peninsula by staging large-scale joint military exercises in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces and found fault with the non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK to tarnish its image.
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK issued a statement denouncing the U.S. extreme hostile policy and clarifying its principled stand on it.
					
					 We fully support the statement.
					
					 We demand the U.S. immediately halt all sorts of hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should know that its frantic hostile acts compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons and that the world will suffer an unimaginable catastrophe if a war breaks out on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. inveterate acts against the DPRK are not beneficial.
					
					 The only solution to solving the issue is for both sides to conclude a peace accord.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately take its hands off Korea and promote the north-south dialogue so that Koreans can solve the inter-Korean issue by themselves.
					
					 We appeal to the international community to put collective pressure on the war-like forces who resort to injustice, domination and exploitation to meet their interests.

articles.title: Czech Organization Supports Statement of NDC
articles.content:
Czech Organization Supports Statement of NDC
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association expressed full support for the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK in its statement on March 20. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The tragedy of territorial and national separation is going on for nearly seven decades on the Korean peninsula and the danger of a war is increasing there owing to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK. 
					
					 After the Second World War the U.S. ignited many wars including the Korean War.
					
					 It is clear to all the peace-loving people who is the chieftain increasing the danger of war in the world. 
					
					 The U.S. has regarded the DPRK as a thorn in the flesh since it was founded. 
					
					 The U.S. introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea from long ago and has threatened the DPRK with nukes. These moves are being intensified as the days go by.
					
					 Each year the U.S. stages war drills on the Korean peninsula to complete a plan for a nuclear strike. 
					
					 However, the U.S. nuclear threats and blackmail will no longer work on the Korean people. 
					
					 The Korean people are fully ready to defend sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 The U.S. should know that the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK is not a bargaining chip. 
					
					 It had better give up the outdated hostile policy to the DPRK and opt for a realistic peace policy before it is too late.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de futbol de equipos Kalmaegi y Jebi
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de futbol de equipos Kalmaegi y Jebi
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC presencio la competencia de futbol masculino entre el equipo Kalmaegi y el Jebi.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio al palco, los jugadores y los espectadores le acogieron con efusivas aclamaciones de "!viva!"
					
					En los juegos renidos, el once Jebi vencio a su rival Kalmaegi por 4 a 2.
					
					Los espectadores dieron efusivos aplausos a los jugadores quienes pusieron de pleno manifiesto su elevada tecnica futbolistica, potencia espiritual e inquebrantable espiritu combativo.
					
					Terminada la competencia, el Mariscal envio el calido saludo de respuesta a los jugadores y espectadores y felicito el exito de la competencia.
					
					Para desarrollar el deporte, es importante elevar la atencion social sobre el deporte al organizar a menudo los juegos como la competencia de futbol, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar trascendentalmente el deporte del pais.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, Kim Su Gil, O Kum Chol, No Kwang Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Jang Tong Un, Yun Jong Rin, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song y Kim Sung Yon.
